com.telekom.m2m.cot.restsdk.smartrest

Class SmartRestApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telekom.m2m.cot.restsdk.smartrest.SmartRestApi

  • public class SmartRestApi
extends Object
    The SmartRestApi is used to register and query SmartREST-templates and to execute requests against them.

    Note that templates for an X-Id can only be registered all in one go and cannot be modified.

    For examples see SmartRestApiIT.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SmartRestApi

        public SmartRestApi(CloudOfThingsRestClient cloudOfThingsRestClient)

    • Method Detail

      • checkTemplateExistence

        public String checkTemplateExistence(String xId)
        Query the server for the existence of smart templates for a given X-Id.
        Parameters:
        xId - the X-Id for which to ask for templates
        Returns:
        the GId of the templates, if they exist, null otherwise.

      • execute

        public String[] execute(String xId,
                        String lines,
                        boolean transientMode)
        Do a SmartREST-request.
        Parameters:
        xId - the X-Id for which this request shall be made. Can be null, omitting the X-Id header, to allow for multiple X-Id ("15,myxid").
        lines - a String with newline-separated lines for the request body
        transientMode - whether to use "X-Cumulocity-Processing-Mode: TRANSIENT" (false: PERSISTENT).
        Returns:
        the response body as an array of individual lines

      • getTemplatesByGId

        public SmartTemplate[] getTemplatesByGId(String gId)
        Get all the templates that belong to this GId. The GId is the one returned by checkTemplateExistence(String).
        Parameters:
        gId - the ID of the managedObject that contains the templates.
        Returns:
        Array containing instances of SmartRequestTemplate and/or SmartResponseTemplate. Can be empty if no templates for this GId are found.

      • storeTemplates

        public String storeTemplates(String xId,
                             SmartRequestTemplate[] requestTemplates,
                             SmartResponseTemplate[] responseTemplates)
        Send SmartTemplates to the server. RequestTemplates and ResponseTemplates have to be sent together, because there is no way to update or add more templates later.
        Parameters:
        xId - the xId which owns the templates
        requestTemplates - all the SmartRequestTemplates
        responseTemplates - all the SmartResponseTemplate
        Returns:
        the GId of the new templates, if they could be stored.
        Throws:
        CotSdkException - if there already are templates or the new templates have errors.

      • deleteByGId

        public void deleteByGId(String gId)
        Delete the templates that were registered for this GId.
        Parameters:
        gId - the GId to delete.

      • getNotificationsConnector

        public SmartCepConnector getNotificationsConnector(String xId)
        Get the SmartCepConnector which can be used to subscribe to channels for real time notifications.
        Parameters:
        xId - the base X-Id to use for the connection.
        Returns:
        the new connector
